Section.name: About GVR&S
Section.description:
GVR&S College of Engineering & Technology was established in Guntur to develop manpower with such a skill and knowledge so that they can serve various industries and the nation. The college offers UG and PG courses in various departments as per the requirement of the students and market. the college is one of the institute in the state which is providing quality education to the rural students and making them to face the global competitions.
The college is spread on an area of 10.8 acres with modern class rooms, computer centers, drawing halls etc. other than this, many facilities like canteen, auditorium, gymnasium are available for the students. The campus is fully surrounded with green trees and gardens that inspire the students to "Think Positive”.
